Reference

All functions

abs2001

2001 Australian Census data on all 150 electorates

abs2004

Imputed Australian Census data for the electorates in place at time of the 2004 Federal election

abs2006

2006 Australian Census data on all 150 electorates (2004 boundaries)

abs2006_e07

2006 Australian Census data on all 150 electorates (2007 boundaries)

abs2007

Imputed Australian Census data for the electorates in place at time of the 2007 Federal election

abs2010

Imputed Australian Census data for the electorates in place at time of the 2010 Federal election

abs2011

2011 Australian Census data on all 150 electorates

abs2013

Imputed Australian Census data for the electorates in place at time of the 2013 Federal election

abs2016

2016 Australian Census data on all 150 electorates

aec_add_carto_f()

aec_add_carto_f - computes and binds the cartogram coordinates to original data

aec_carto_f()

aec_carto_f - run dorling on data centers

aec_carto_join_f()

aec_carto_join_f - bind the cartogram coordinates to original data

aec_extract_f()

aec_extract_f - extract subsets geographically

circle()

Draw a circle

complete_color()

Auto complete (or cut) a vector to a fixed length

dorling()

Produce a Pseudo-Dorling Cartogram.

eechidna-package

Exploring Election and Census Highly Informative Data Nationally for Australia

firstpref_pollingbooth_download()

Download first preference voting data from each polling booth, from the six Australian Federal elections between 2001 and 2016.

fp01

2001 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

fp04

2004 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

fp07

2007 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

fp10

2010 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of House of Representative for each electorate

fp13

2013 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

fp16

2016 Australian Federal election data: First preference votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

get_electorate_shapes()

Extract shapefiles (of Australian electorates) from raw file into fortified map and data components.

launch_app()

Shiny app for exploring census and electorate data

load_shapefile()

Load shapefile of Australia into R

mapping_fn()

Compute areas of intersection between each election boundary and those in the Census of interest.

nat_data01

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2001

nat_data04

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2004

nat_data07

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2007

nat_data10

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2010

nat_data13

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2013

nat_data16

Data of the Australian Electorates from 2016

nat_map01

Map of Australian Electorates from 2001

nat_map04

Map of Australian Electorates from 2004

nat_map07

Map of Australian Electorates from 2007

nat_map10

Map of Australian Electorates from 2010

nat_map13

Map of Australian Electorates from 2013

nat_map16

Map of Australian Electorates from 2016

sF_download()

Download SpatialPolygonsDataFrame containing polygons of Australian federal electorates

tcp01

2001 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tcp04

2004 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tcp07

2007 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tcp10

2010 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tcp13

2013 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tcp16

2016 Australian Federal election data: Two candidate preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tpp01

2001 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate. where Labor and Liberal parties were the two most popular parties.

tpp04

2004 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tpp07

2007 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tpp10

2010 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tpp13

2013 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representatives) in each electorate.

tpp16

2016 Australian Federal election data: Two party preferred votes for candidates (House of Representative) in each electorate.

twocand_pollingbooth_download()

Download two candidate preference voting data from each polling booth, from the five Australian Federal elections between 2004 and 2016.

twoparty_pollingbooth_download()

Download two party preference voting data from each polling booth, from the six Australian Federal elections between 2001 and 2016.

weighted_avg_census()

Function to compute weighted average of Census information using imputed populations as weights
